20110114182616.000|20110114182616.000|CC1|BALLOT.                         
20110114182616.000|20110114182619.000|CC1|THERE'S NO RULE, ANDREA, THAT   
20110114182619.000|20110114182621.000|CC1|WOULD COMPEL ANY OF THESE FOLKS 
20110114182621.000|20110114182621.000|CC1|TO DROP OUT.                    
20110114182621.000|20110114182623.000|CC1|IF STEELE OR ANYONE WANTS TO,
